result.title: And Guardiola's pass control
result.content:
e as soon as possible hurried, did not score a goal at home to restore the dignity of honor, indeed lost face.Frankly, the team's style of play is not only affecting the team's tactical style, a deeper reflection of the coach and the players understanding of football, as well as factors that will, honor and so spiritual. Manchester United's "magic" of Liverpool's "toughness," Dortmund "rigid", are reflected in their style of play. Heynckes Bayern described the essence of German football to the extreme — emphasizes whole Fanqiang quickly and efficiently back, holding a high hit, three-dimensional changeable, so large-scale cooperation tactics have inspired the players will maximize force. And Guardiola's pass control type transformation, let the players down feet in slowly, and sloppy passing, the lost opportunity fleeting, but also lost the sense of shame after the bloody courage and the will.German football combine traditional techniques is the right wayIt should be noted,nike free 3.0 v5 comprar invincible Bayern in the Bundesliga this season, the more is its strong performance last season inertia dictates. The rapid decline in the state after winning the league, the mentality of the players exposed melon Shuai ability to control short board. The same number of rounds in advance scoop to "salad plate," Bayern will be able to bang on the season, the Champions League and continued to scoop under the German Cup this season is very different, and one reason is worth pondering melon handsome.Before this defeat, many football legend Guardiola has expressed his dissatisfaction, Franz Beckenbauer of Bayern played today frankly sleepy. Melon handsome, the type of technology with the German soccer football better combine tradition seems to reproduce the brilliant Bayern is the right way.Historically, German football has always been based on abundant physical, tactical rigor, cohesive unit, indomitable will

, known in international football, is the power of a model school play. Admittedly, the technical football popular today, Guardiola and technical transformation Loew and the German team Bayern trend of the times, but it was toward the overly respected technology, ignoring the other extreme football tradition, too far.Guardiola's problem is that extreme self-esteem bodiless La Masia youth academy short pass play, ignoring the strong heritage and German football player realistic conditions. Big burly, turned slowly, at the foot slightly rough Bayern, Barcelona simply copy the "small Quicking" tactics will obviously encounter "acclimatized."Bayern's current lineup of brand perspective,nike free run 3 baratas there is no obvious short board, Lewandowski next season to join the team will make the more powerful. But worries have emerged that a Bundesliga team this season as a whole less competitive, although four teams into the Champions League elimination round, but Schalke 04, Bayer Leverkusen are big score out. Next season, stronger Bayern in the Bundesliga can get the real test will directly determine the combat in the war in Europe. Guardiola hold a good hand, if the content with dominating the German, but nothing in the Champions League, Bayern Munich club level and I believe the fans are not satisfied. (End) 2014/04/30 07:02 Beijing time on April 30, 2014, Battle of King Mountain Thunder and Grizzlies started, Granville fourth game less dismal performance, but the game Westbrook scored 30 points and 10 rebounds and 13 assists, steals and finished level of God's salvation thunder dunks in the regular time four seconds, but in the end still Grizzlies 100-99 in overtime victory over the Thunder.Arena of life and death battle, and even the importance of the Thunder game, but Westbrook also abandoned all thoughts, in the first section on the shooting unusual resolute, frequently in the vicinity of the area to show

his unique pull-up jumper, the Grizzlies for Granville's defense suddenly become a little less helpless, and in a fast break, Westbrook amazing explosive show exhaustive: he waded chase step on defense Conley, a battle ax buckle to resolve the fighting. In a breakthrough, he'll open the top defensive layup. The first section of Granville few big kill four, nine voted 5 scored 14 points.Of course, excessive consumption and the impact of the first section is bound to affect the physical, not to mention the Grizzlies in the second quarter increased the strength of the defense to let Westbrook breakthrough began hitting the wall,nike free 5.0+ mujer then again in the second quarter saw the "positive and negative "Viagra less negative — rely on free throws throughout the second quarter, he scored 2 points, but rather the six shots are almost always forced and unreasonable without a hit, which directly dragged down the entire Thunder hit rate and attack Rotary rhythm.Although Viagra is a little up the third quarter, "stepping" super Gasol layup, but then falling again feel less Viagra, Viagra Grizzlies overall defense for killing little too great. Of course, you should have the ability to save a mistake, several key assists in the third quarter last chase phased Viagra is fairly small to atone, while one-third will be key in the Thunder 20 minutes 3.7 seconds behind the catch of 6 points. After three sessions Westbrook scored a triple-double with 21 points, eight rebounds and seven assists. When Viagra can do little to share, when the Thunder ball becomes smooth and there is a threat, especially with small and Du between the lifeblood of the Thunder offense.IV Wei is still less rush big kill, six minutes in the distal small plus Viagra at least once
